import{ethers}from"ethers";import{contractAddress,contractABIArray}from"./contractConfig";// Use Web3Provider for ethers v5
const provider=new ethers.providers.Web3Provider(window.ethereum);export async function connectWallet(){try{if(!window.ethereum){alert("MetaMask is not installed!");return null;}await window.ethereum.request({method:"eth_requestAccounts"});const signer=provider.getSigner();return signer;}catch(error){console.error("Wallet connection error:",error);return null;}}export async function getContract(){try{const signer=await connectWallet();if(!signer)return null;const contract=new ethers.Contract(contractAddress,contractABIArray,signer);return contract;}catch(error){console.error("Error getting contract:",error);return null;}}
